    public class ChicagoActivity
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
    The ChicagoActivity class is the controller for the activity_chicago.xml page. This class initiates UI components and handles user interaction events
    Author:
    Serena Zeng, Jackson Lee
